title: Adventures in Silver Elo - MF support
body:
Picked MF as support 2 games in a row, the results:
- Got flamed by my entire team
- Did as much damage as them
- Had a decent kill contribution
- Ensured pressure where i could
- Still got flamed in post game, but not just by my own team, the enemy jhin's were pretty triggered too

BTW they were both wins, i broke the teamfights wide open, cleaver + Ulti is a tiny bit ridiculous (just over 1.2k damage at rank 3, providing they get hit by every wave

Will my reports do anything? Probably not 
Is it time to climb by "troll picking"? Probably
Can i get away with it? Probably (providing i don't just int)
Will silver elo ever understand the concept of off meta? Probably not
Do i feel pleased with myself for tilting 9 other players just by picking MF support? You bet your ass i do.

Ahh low elo, you never cease to amuse me.
